mapper.select: SELECT role.role_id FROM uaa_role role, uaa_resource res, uaa_authority auth, uaa_roleAuthority roleAuth, uaa_authorityResource authRes WHERE role.role_id=roleAuth.role_id and roleAuth.auth_id=auth.auth_id and auth.auth_id=authRes.auth_id and authRes.res_id=res.res_id and res.res_uri=#{res_uri} and res.res_action=#{res_action}
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM uaa_user WHERE username=#{username}
SELECT ar.role_id FROM uaa_userRole ar WHERE ar.user_id=#{user_id}
